snippet.title: Hazelnut Bastille Full Trailer 1
snippet.description:
Hazelnut Bastille, for PC, Mac, Linux, and now Nintendo Switch, is a lush, topdown Zelda-like ARPG in a 16bit style, which seeks to continue the great lineage of superior design from the mid 90's. Hazelnut has been in development since April 2016, and we will continue to bring updates and content to our homepage and Twitter as things continue to progress!

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1330693854/hazelnut-bastille-a-16bit-indie-adventure 
(Live on Kickstarter Now!) 

You can sign up for our Newsletter, And find the demo at:

https://www.aloftstudio.com/hazelnutbastille

Find and follow us on twitter, at:

https://twitter.com/AloftStudio

Crash our discord at:

https://discord.gg/VVXThhm
